title: Executive Order 6515-A-Authorizing Charles E. Wyzanski, Jr., to Act as Secretary of Labor
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me under the provisions of section 179 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (5 U.S.C., sec. 6), I hereby authorize and direct Charles E. Wyzanski, Jr., Solicitor of Labor, to perform the duties of Secretary of Labor during the absence of the Secretary of Labor and the Assistant Secretary of Labor.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6515-A-Authorizing Charles E. Wyzanski, Jr., to Act as Secretary of Labor Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373270
